item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy, forwarded to Ambassador Burns and U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): I am publicly sharing an open letter addressed to French Foreign Affairs Minister Catherine Colonna (@MinColonna), Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary (@BLortholary), and Consul General Guillaume ROY. This letter concerns a deeply serious matter: the possibility of being… pic.twitter.com/iuTu24tC1n — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023

item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. about Xi Jinping (习近平), the President of the People’s Republic of China, and Li Keqiang (李克强), the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject: XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org
